sentences.en: He came upon the hulking redbrick hospital.
sentences.cn: 他偶然发现了这座红砖砌成的森然高耸的医院。

sentences.en: Jason Fisher's hulking form cast a boxy shadow over the rows of sushi.
sentences.cn: 詹森费蛇耳笨重的身躯拖着的四四方方的影子遮住了这堆寿丝.

sentences.en: Most telling was the 62 % fall in sales of Hummers, GM's hulking military - style SUVs.
sentences.cn: 降幅更大的有通用体型笨重的军用 型 SUV悍马, 销量下挫62%.

sentences.en: Two hulking figures guarded the entrance of the club.
sentences.cn: 两个壮汉守卫在俱乐部门口。

sentences.en: We can't move that hulking desk on our own.
sentences.cn: 我们自己没法搬运那张笨重的桌子.

sentences.en: We can't move that hulking great desk on our own.
sentences.cn: 靠我们自己没法搬动那张又大又笨重的办公桌.

sentences.en: We can't move that hulking great table on our own.
sentences.cn: 靠我们自己没法搬动那张又大又笨重的桌子.

sentences.en: When I woke up there was a hulking figure staring down at me.
sentences.cn: 我醒来时，有个巨形身影正低头盯着我看。

words.tran_cn: 庞然大物般出现；赫然显现
